fields_of_interest: Trade, Consumers, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Fraud prevention
eu_initiatives: trade regulation, IPO rights, consumer security and protection, e.commerce, internet content, illicit trade
organisation_name: association de lutte cojntre le commerce illicite (ALCCI)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: participating in expert meeting organized by EC or EP, regular exchange and visits to EC officials, managing a website www.alcci.fr, organizing working session in Paris and issuing information and briefing notes
goals__remit: la raison d'etre de l'association est de soutenir la lutte contre le commerce illicite en développant une meilleure connaissance du phénomène, en sensibilisant les parties intéressées  et en appuyant les initiatives allant dans ce sens
